name: Burning Arctic
description:
This game is still in development and developed by a team of students in the course of Game Design and Development.

Burning Arctic is a level-based adventure game offering a visceral and exciting spectacle of the serious destruction of the arctic caused by man through exploitation. The game calls attention to the need to deal with this very serious issue. The aim is to sensitize the players to the catastrophes and consequences of climate change as well as inform about different region specific problems. Therefore, the player is equipped with a bunch of polar animals who need to overcome different levels of challenges while the main goal is to bring a lost ice bear baby back to his mother. Only with combined forces they'll be able to reach their goal.
